name: Matchio
overview:
Matchio is a one-of-a-kind marketplace geared to help students buy and sell between each other. Its quick and easy.

You can list through our unique interface what you want to sell or what you want to buy. That’s it. You’ll be notified by text message and email when there’s a match.

And with MatchMeet, an easy-to-use scheduling tool, the buyer and seller fill in dates, times and locations on campus where they are available to meet for a quick exchange of goods.

Matchio is currently live at 6 schools: UMass Amherst, Coe College, University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee, Bradley University, Miami University Ohio & Concordia College Moorhead.
